name: Basic Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.
<setup action>

display action

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'

camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20

 camera offset: right, 50


else

camera focus: user
zoom: 110%, 20
wait: 20
camera focus: target
zoom: 110%, 20
 camera offset: right, 50

end

immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  move user: targets, front, 20
else
  perform start
end


wait for movement
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait for animation

action effect
wait for animation
wait for movement
wait: 5

</target action>

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.
<target action>
MOTION GUARD: target
wait for animation
</target action>
